About

Hi! My name is Ivan Rodrigues. I am currently working as a full-stack web developer (React & Java/Node.js), with a strong passion for UX Design (graphical skills) as well. With several years experience as a professional in the IT sector, I have acquired the skills and knowledge necessary to make your next project a success.

I love helping businesses and people with their digital transformation. My mantra is all about bridging the gap between your needs and their technical implementation, while keeping in mind to make the web a better and more accessible place for everyone.

If you believe I could be of any help to you or your company, please feel free to get in touch or connect!

Full-stack Developer

Projects

  • Web Resume Generator

SMALS

Web/CMS Functional Analyst

Sep 2019 - Aug 2022

Since my studies, I have been working at SMALS as a Web-CMS oriented Functional Analyst. SMALS is an IT services non-profit organization working exclusively for the Belgian government. My main responsabilities are all about successfully managing web based projects for the Belgian institutions.

Activities

  • Waterfall project management, with implementation of several Agile (Scrum) concepts
  • User stories redaction within JIRA and Confluence
  • Configuration of content-types and forms within ElasticMS (SMALS exclusive CMS)
  • Web/API development in Twig - Symfony’s PHP template language
  • Projects budget and effort estimations - writing of "Project Initiation Documents" (PID)
  • UX design & Wireframing
  • Leading various workshops and product demonstrations

Projects

  • Website development
  • Contact forms configuration
  • Web cookies management
